sources.name: sUserData
sources.description: This is the description sections.  This is a parquet data source.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		create_date as timestamp,
		user_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		FullName as string,
		login_id as string,
		email as string,
		active as integer,
		update_date as timestamp,
		billable as integer,
		mscrm_system_user_id as integer,
		mscrm_cat_consultant_id as integer,
		mscrm_contact_id as integer,
		contractor_rate as integer,
		contractor_rate_type as integer,
		user_guid as integer,
		bamboo_id as double,
		practice as string,
		current_manager as integer,
		xCustom as string,
		joblevel_rate as integer,
		mobile_phone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sUserData
sUserData select(mapColumn(
		create_date,
		user_id,
		first_name,
		last_name,
		FullName,
		login_id,
		email,
		active,
		update_date,
		billable,
		mscrm_system_user_id,
		mscrm_cat_consultant_id,
		mscrm_contact_id,
		contractor_rate,
		contractor_rate_type,
		user_guid,
		bamboo_id,
		practice,
		current_manager,
		xCustom,
		mobile_phone,
		joblevel_rate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectUserData
SelectUserData aggregate(groupBy(billable,
		active,
		user_id),
	create_date = max(create_date),
		first_name = max(first_name),
		last_name = max(last_name),
		FullName = max(FullName),
		login_id = max(login_id),
		email = max(email),
		bamboo_id = max(bamboo_id),
		practice = max(practice),
		current_manager = max(current_manager),
		joblevel_rate = max(joblevel_rate),
		mobile_phone = max(mobile_phone),
		xCustom = max(xCustom)) ~> AggrUserData
AggrUserData sink(input(
		LFBI_ID as integer,
		LFBI_LoadTime as timestamp,
		LFBI_Start as timestamp,
		LFBI_End as timestamp,
		LFBI_Current as boolean,
		billable as boolean,
		active as boolean,
		create_date as timestamp,
		user_id as integer,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		FullName as string,
		login_id as string,
		email as string,
		bamboo_id as integer,
		practice as string,
		current_manager as integer,
		joblevel_rate as decimal(19,4),
		Mobile_Phone as string,
		OnPTO as boolean,
		xCustom as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		LFBI_LoadTime = create_date,
		LFBI_Current = create_date,
		LFBI_Start = create_date,
		LFBI_End = create_date,
		billable,
		active,
		create_date,
		first_name,
		last_name,
		FullName,
		login_id,
		email,
		bamboo_id,
		practice,
		current_manager,
		joblevel_rate,
		Mobile_Phone = mobile_phone,
		xCustom
	)) ~> dPersonnel
